titleInfo.title: Pearl River Valley Electric Power Assoc. Job No. 37168

mods.abstract: Invoice (No. 1718) for an order placed by the Pearl River Valley Electric Power Association for 100 two color window cards for a performance by Minnie Pearl and The Willis Brothers at the Rawls Riding Arena on September 25. Receipt indicates the agreed price, quantity, shipping method, and a description of the posters.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
